law.catch_line: The Board of Community College Trustees for Harford County consists of nine members....

section.section: The Board of Community College Trustees for Harford County consists of nine members.

Subject to paragraph (4) of this subsection, each of the members shall be:
A resident of Harford County; and
Appointed by the Governor for terms of 5 years.

Of the nine members:
Six shall be appointed with one from each of the six councilmanic districts; and
Three shall be appointed from the county at large.
No member may be a member of the Harford County Board of Education while serving as a member of the Board.

text.section: A member of the Board may not serve for more than two consecutive 5 year terms.

At least twice annually, the Board of Community College Trustees, the College President, the Harford County Board of Education, and the Superintendent of the Harford County public schools shall meet to discuss issues of mutual concern.
